item.title: Shell boilerplate
item.description:
#!/bin/bash readonly program="$(basename "${0}")" usage() { cat <<USAGE Description Usage: ${program} [<arguments>] ${program} -h | --help Options: -h --help Show this screen. USAGE } error() { printf "	error: %s
" "%@" >&2 exit 1 } info() { printf "	info: %s
" "%@" >&2 } command_1() { printf "${program}is unimplemented
" } main() { if [[ ${1:-} =~ ^-h|--help$ ]]; then usage else command_1 "$@" fi } trap 'error "errexit on line $LINENO with exit code: $?
